title: Funn Holeshot locks-on affordable 31mm diameter MTB grip with vibration damping claims
content:
Funn has added a 31mm diameter MTB grip to the now five strong roster, with an under palm reinforced comfort zone designed to absorb vibrations and keep fatigue to a minimum. The single lock-on design is available in 10 colors, one of which is likely to match well with whatever jewelry your bike is currently

The post Funn Holeshot locks-on affordable 31mm diameter MTB grip with vibration damping claims appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
